channel.title: Would an old celeron machine make a good dedicated server
channel.description:
it has a celleron and 256mb ram
would this run the server fine?

item.title: Would an old celeron machine make a good dedicated server
item.dc:creator: @Stilles Stilles
item.description:
@Stilles wrote:

If the internet is quite fast, i would think its fine. I dont think you will need the extra ram unless your going to like 40+ players.

Netware? Uh…?

But yeah, if its dedicated to only the server, i would say its fine also.

I dont think a javaserver needs much ram. 256 is proly fine.

Read full topic
item.source: Would an old celeron machine make a good dedicated server

item.title: Would an old celeron machine make a good dedicated server
item.dc:creator: @jynxsk8r jynxsk8r
item.description:
@jynxsk8r wrote:

i dont know what the prosesser is clocked at

but i might upgrade the ram to 512mb just to be safe

also should i install netware on it?

Read full topic
item.source: Would an old celeron machine make a good dedicated server

item.title: Would an old celeron machine make a good dedicated server
item.dc:creator: @KingTasty KingTasty
item.description:
@KingTasty wrote:

saying it’s totally dedicated to it and maybe you have your no-ip on it i’d say yeh
also have a fast internet

item.source: Would an old celeron machine make a good dedicated server

item.title: Would an old celeron machine make a good dedicated server
item.dc:creator: @Stilles Stilles
item.description:
@Stilles wrote:

What’s the processor clocked at?
What type of internet connection will it be on?

Just a few things i thought i would ask

If you have a good connection and you have the minimum amount of programs running on it, i think it will be fine.

Read full topic
